summary: This is an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in New York forwarding a civilian tip regarding the Epstein investigation. The tip involves a New Jersey-based individual who knows someone with relevant information and wants to connect that person to law enforcement. The email requests the FBI to contact the tipster.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, working in the New York office, who is forwarding a tip about the Epstein investigation to the FBI team and requesting follow-up.

events.title: Receipt of Civilian Tip
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's office received information that a New Jersey-based individual knows someone with information relevant to the Epstein investigation and wants to connect that friend to law enforcement.

keyFacts: A civilian tip was received by the U.S. Attorney's office regarding the Epstein investigation on August 8, 2019.
The tip involves a New Jersey-based individual who claims to know a friend with relevant information.
The Assistant U.S. Attorney forwarded the tip to the FBI, requesting they contact the tipster to gather the information.
The document indicates ongoing investigative efforts to gather information from the public following Epstein's arrest.
